statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses;
SELECT patient_id, expense_amount FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT expense_amount, claim_id FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT id, patient_id FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE id > 100 AND claim_id LIKE 'CLM%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_date ASC, expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC, expense_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM healthcare_expenses GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_amount FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY claim_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY patient_id, expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense FROM healthcare_expenses GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_expense > 5000;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 2001;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE patient_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM healthcare_expenses GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount, expense_date FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC, expense_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_claims >= 2 ORDER BY total_claims DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses
SELECT expense_amount, description FROM healthcare_expenses
SELECT date, expense_amount FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT patient_name FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_number = 'ABC123'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY date DESC, expense_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT expense_amount, description FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_id = 1
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM reimbursement WHERE date_processed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT expense_amount, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_expenses GROUP BY expense_amount HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses;
SELECT id, patient_id, expense_date, expense_amount FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT patient_id, count(*) as total_claims FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM healthcare_expenses GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT ic.*, br.billed_amount, rr.reimbursed_amount FROM insurance_claims ic JOIN billing_records br ON ic.claim_id = br.claim_id JOIN reimbursement_records rr ON ic.claim_id = rr.claim_id;
SELECT AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense_amount, MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense_amount FROM healthcare_expenses;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT provider, expense_amount FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT provider, insurance_id, expense_date FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC, expense_amount ASC, patient_id
SELECT patient_id, expense_amount, provider FROM healthcare_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 AND provider LIKE '%Blue Cross%'
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id, provider_name FROM insurance_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount_paid, method FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' AND amount_paid >= 500 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
